trans-unit.source: Represents a response to a request being handled by an <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et svar på en forespørsel om håndtert av en <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When a client makes a request for a resource handled by an <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> object, the request and response are made available to your application in an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Når en klient sender en forespørsel for en ressurs håndtert av en <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>objektet, forespørselen og svar er gjort tilgjengelig for programmet i en <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>objektet.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> </xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: The request is represented by an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> object and is available in the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Forespørselen er representert av en <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>objekt og er tilgjengelig i den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>

trans-unit.source: The response is represented by an HttpListenerResponse object and is available in the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Svaret representeres av et objekt som HttpListenerResponse og er tilgjengelig i den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the response by setting various properties, such as <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse svaret ved å angi ulike egenskaper som <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A>.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance to which response data can be written.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente en <xref:System.IO.Stream>forekomsten kan skrive data til som svar.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Finally, send the response data to the client by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt sender svardata til klienten ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the client without sending a response.
trans-unit.target: Lukker tilkoblingen til klienten uten å sende et svar.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an object that has already been closed has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden for et objekt som allerede er lukket har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: If the response has not already been closed, this method closes it and the associated <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> and <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis svaret ikke allerede er lukket, denne metoden lukker den og den tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>og <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext>objekter.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerContext> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>

trans-unit.source: The connection to the client is also closed, regardless of the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.KeepAlive%2A> property value of the client request.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen til klienten er også lukket, uavhengig av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.KeepAlive%2A>egenskapsverdi for klientforespørselen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified header and value to the HTTP headers for this response.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte hodet og verdien i HTTP-hode for dette svaret.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Set%2A> method on the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden, tilsvarer kaller den <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Set%2A>-metoden på samlingen ble returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the header specified in `name` does not exist, this method inserts a new header into the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> property's collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hodet som er angitt i `name` finnes ikke, denne metoden setter inn en ny overskrift til den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>egenskapens samlingen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `name` is present in the collection, this method replaces the existing value with `value`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `name` finnes i samlingen, denne metoden erstatter den eksisterende verdien med `value`.

trans-unit.source: To add a value to an existing header without replacing the existing value, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AppendHeader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til en verdi i en eksisterende overskrift uten å erstatte den eksisterende verdien, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AppendHeader%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AppendHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to set.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på HTTP-hodet til å angi.

trans-unit.source: The value for the `name` header.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den `name` hodet.

trans-unit.source: name is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameer eller en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to specify a value for the specified header.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi en verdi for det angitte hodet.

trans-unit.source: -or- name or value contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: - eller - name eller value inneholder ugyldige tegn.

trans-unit.source: The length of value is greater than 65,535 characters.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på value er større enn 65 535 tegn.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref:System.Net.Cookie> to the collection of cookies for this response.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte <xref:System.Net.Cookie>-samlingen for informasjonskapsler for dette svaret.</xref:System.Net.Cookie>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Net.CookieCollection.Add%2A> method on the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden, tilsvarer kaller den <xref:System.Net.CookieCollection.Add%2A>-metoden på samlingen ble returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A> </xref:System.Net.CookieCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the specified cookie does not exist in the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A> property's collection, `cookie` is added.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte informasjonskapselen ikke finnes i den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A>egenskapens samlingen `cookie` er lagt til.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Cookies%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cookie exists in the collection, `cookie` replaces it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis informasjonskapselen finnes i samlingen `cookie` erstatter den.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Cookie> to add to the collection to be sent with this response.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Cookie>å legge til i samlingen sendes i svaret.</xref:System.Net.Cookie>

trans-unit.source: cookie is .
trans-unit.target: cookieis .

trans-unit.source: Appends a value to the specified HTTP header to be sent with this response.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en verdi i det angitte HTTP-hodet sendes i svaret.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add%2A> method on the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden, tilsvarer kaller den <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add%2A>-metoden på samlingen ble returnert av den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the header specified in `header` does not exist, this method inserts a new header into the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> property's collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hodet som er angitt i `header` finnes ikke, denne metoden setter inn en ny overskrift til den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>egenskapens samlingen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `header` is present in the collection, this method adds `value` to the existing values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `header` finnes i samlingen, legger til denne metoden `value` til de eksisterende verdiene.

trans-unit.source: To replace the value of an existing header, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AddHeader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil erstatte verdien av et eksisterende, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AddHeader%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.AddHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to append `value` to.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på HTTP-hode å tilføye `value` til.

trans-unit.source: The value to append to the `name` header.
trans-unit.target: Verdien du vil legge til den `name` hodet.

trans-unit.source: name is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameer eller en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- You are not allowed to specify a value for the specified header.
trans-unit.target: - eller du har ikke tillatelse til å angi en verdi for det angitte hodet.

trans-unit.source: -or- name or value contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: - eller - name eller value inneholder ugyldige tegn.

trans-unit.source: The length of value is greater than 65,535 characters.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på value er større enn 65 535 tegn.

trans-unit.source: Sends the response to the client and releases the resources held by this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Sender svar til klienten og frigir ressursene holdes av dette <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This method closes the response stream and the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden lukker dataflyten svar og <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>knyttet til svaret.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified byte array to the client and releases the resources held by this <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den angitte Bytematrisen til klienten og frigir ressursene holdes av dette <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If you are sending body data with the response, you can use this method to send it as a <xref:System.Byte> array instead of writing the body data to the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A> property and calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender body data med svaret, kan du bruke denne metoden til å sende den som en <xref:System.Byte>matrise i stedet for skriving av meldingsteksten data til den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A>egenskapen og kaller den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream%2A> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This method closes the response stream and the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden lukker dataflyten svar og <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>knyttet til svaret.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the response to send to the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Byte>matrise som inneholder svaret skal sendes til klienten.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to block execution while flushing the stream to the client; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å blokkere kjøring under tømming dataflyten til klienten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: responseEntity is .
trans-unit.target: responseEntityis .

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> for this response's <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir av <xref:System.Text.Encoding>for dette svarets <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*>.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*> </xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object can be used to convert byte sequences into character sets (code pages) and characters into byte sequences.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Text.Encoding>objektet kan brukes til å konvertere byte sekvenser til tegnsett (tegntabell) og tegn i byte sekvenser.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object suitable for use with the data in the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*> property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no encoding is specified.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Text.Encoding>objektet brukes med dataene i den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*>egenskapen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen koding er angitt.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.OutputStream*> </xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bytes in the body data included in the response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall byte i meldingsteksten dataene som er inkludert i svaret.

trans-unit.source: The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the response's body data.
trans-unit.target: Den `Content-Length` hodet uttrykker lang, i byte for meldingsteksten data.

trans-unit.source: When using a format that is not send the data chunked or raw, you must set the ContentLength64 property.
trans-unit.target: Når dataene ved hjelp av et format som ikke sender delvis eller raw, må du angi egenskapen ContentLength64.

trans-unit.source: If you do not, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> does not send the response data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den <xref:System.Net.HttpListener>sender ikke svardata.</xref:System.Net.HttpListener>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of response headers, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over svarhoder, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>

trans-unit.source: The value of the response's <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Length" name="Content-Length" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Length" name="Content-Length" href=""> </xref> hodet.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: The response is already being sent.
trans-unit.target: Svaret er allerede sendt.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MIME type of the content returned.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir MIME-typen for innhold som returneres.

trans-unit.source: When communicating with a Web browser, you should explicitly set this property when returning any content type other than `text/html`.
trans-unit.target: Under kommunikasjon med en nettleser, du eksplisitt må sette denne egenskapen når returnere en innholdstype enn `text/html`.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of response headers, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over svarhoder, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> instance that contains the text of the response's <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>forekomsten som inneholder teksten i svaret <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""> </xref> overskrift.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of cookies returned with the response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir samlingen av informasjonskapsler returnert med svaret.

trans-unit.source: A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer.
trans-unit.target: En informasjonskapsel er navn/verdi-tekstdata fra en nettserver som er lagret på den lokale (klient) datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The following cookie formats are supported: Netscape, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965.
trans-unit.target: Følgende informasjonskapsel formater som støttes: Netscape RFC 2109 og RFC 2965.

trans-unit.source: The Netscape cookie specification is available at http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; the RFC documents are available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org).
trans-unit.target: Den Netscape spesifikasjonen for informasjonskapsel som er tilgjengelig på http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; RFC-dokumenter som er tilgjengelige på [http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.CookieCollection> that contains cookies to accompany the response.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.CookieCollection>som inneholder informasjonskapsler sammen svaret.</xref:System.Net.CookieCollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection is empty if no cookies have been added to the response.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen er tom hvis ingen informasjonskapsler er lagt til i svar.

trans-unit.source: Copies properties from the specified <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"></xref> to this response.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper fra den angitte <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"> </xref> til dette svaret.

trans-unit.source: If you regularly change many properties from their default values to a fixed set of new values, it is convenient to use an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse> instance as a template.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer regelmessig mange egenskaper fra standardverdiene til et fast sett med nye verdier, er det praktisk å bruke en <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse>forekomsten som en mal.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse>

trans-unit.source: Customize the template response once and, instead of configuring each response separately, call the CopyFrom method to configure a new response based on property values in the template response.
trans-unit.target: Tilpass malen svaret én gang og, i stedet for å konfigurere hvert svar separat, kalle metoden CopyFrom for å konfigurere svar nye basert på verdier i svaret mal.

trans-unit.source: The following properties are copied from `templateResponse` to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Følgende egenskaper kopieres fra `templateResponse` til den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ProtocolVersion%2A>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A> - <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ProtocolVersion%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ProtocolVersion%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A></xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Headers%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"></xref> instance to copy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"> </xref> forekomsten skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir samlingen av hodet navn/verdi-par returnert av serveren.

trans-unit.source: Response headers contain metadata information such as the date and time of the response, the identity of the responding server, and the MIME type of the data contained in the response body.
trans-unit.target: Svarhoder inneholde metadatainformasjon for eksempel dato og klokkeslett i svaret, identiteten til serveren som svarer og MIME-typen for dataene i meldingsteksten svar.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of response headers, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over svarhoder, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.HttpResponseHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you attempt to set a Content-Length, Keep-Alive, Transfer-Encoding, or WWW-Authenticate header using the Headers property, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du prøver å angi en Content-Length Behold aktiv, Transfer-Encoding, eller vil bli utløst WWW-Authenticate overskriften med egenskapen overskrifter et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A> properties to set these headers.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A>Egenskaper for å angi overskriftene.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the Transfer-Encoding or WWW-Authenticate headers manually.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi Transfer-Encoding eller WWW-Authenticate hodene manuelt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> instance that contains all the explicitly set HTTP headers to be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>-forekomst som inneholder alle de eksplisitt satt HTTP-hoder som skal inkluderes i svaret.</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> instance specified for a set operation is not valid for a response.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>forekomsten som er angitt for en set-operasjon ikke er gyldig for svar.</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server requests a persistent connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om serveren ber om en fast tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en HTTP-klienten og serveren forventer til exchange dataene flere ganger i en kort periode, raskere en fast tilkobling kommunikasjonen ved at de kan unngå overhead må åpner og lukker en TCP-tilkobling for hver melding.

trans-unit.source: Persistent connections are in widespread use in communications between modern Web browsers and Web servers.
trans-unit.target: Faste tilkoblinger er omfattende brukes i kommunikasjon mellom moderne nettlesere og nettservere.

trans-unit.source: Persistent connections are described in detail in the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification (RFC 2616) available at the RTF Editor Web site ([http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org)).
trans-unit.target: Faste tilkoblinger beskrives i detalj i HTTP/1.1 protokollen spesifikasjonen (RFC 2616) tilgjengelig på webområdet for RTF redigeringsprogrammet ([http://www.rfc-editor.org](http://www.rfc-editor.org)).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server requests a persistent connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serveren ber om en fast tilkobling; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to which a response can be written.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt svar kan skrives.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A> property must be set explicitly before writing to the returned <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A>egenskapen må angis eksplisitt før skriving til det returnerte <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.ContentLength64%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Closing the request does not close the stream returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Lukke forespørselen ikke Lukk dataflyten som ble returnert av denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: When you no longer need the stream, you should close it by calling the Close method.
trans-unit.target: Når du trenger ikke lenger dataflyten, må du lukke den ved å kalle metoden Close.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to which a response can be written.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt svar kan skrives.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP version used for the response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir HTTP-versjonen som brukes i svaret.

trans-unit.source: The capabilities of different HTTP versions are specified in the documents available at http://www.ietf.org.
trans-unit.target: Funksjoner i forskjellige HTTP-versjoner er angitt i dokumenter som er tilgjengelige på http://www.ietf.org.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> object indicating the version of HTTP used when responding to the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Version>objekt som angir hvilken versjon av HTTP brukes ved å svare på klienten.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne egenskapen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation does not have its <xref:System.Version.Major*> property set to 1 or does not have its <xref:System.Version.Minor*> property set to either 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon ikke har den <> </> *> egenskapen satt til 1 eller har ikke den <> </> *> egenskapen satt til 0 eller 1.

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Configures the response to redirect the client to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer svaret omadressere klienten til den angitte URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The Redirect method is used to redirect a client to the new location for a resource.
trans-unit.target: Omadressering-metoden brukes til å omadressere en klient dit for en ressurs.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the response's `Location` header to `url`, the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A> property to <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, and the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A> property to "Found".
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir for `Location` overskrift til `url`, <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, og <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A>egenskapen "Fant".</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusDescription%2A> </xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL that the client should use to locate the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: URL-en som klienten skal bruke til å finne den forespurte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref> header in this response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""> </xref> -overskrift i dette svaret.

trans-unit.source: The `Location` header specifies the URL to which the client is directed to locate a requested resource.
trans-unit.target: Den `Location` hodet angir URL-adressen som klienten er rettet mot en forespurte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property does not automatically set the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen for denne egenskapen er satt av <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the absolute URL to be sent to the client in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder absolutt URL-adressen som skal sendes til klienten i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Location" name="Location" href=""> </xref> overskrift.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the response uses chunked transfer encoding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om svaret bruker delvis overføring koding.

trans-unit.source: The body of a chunked message is made up of a series of chunks.
trans-unit.target: Meldingsteksten i en delvis melding består av en rekke biter.

trans-unit.source: Each chunk comprises of two parts—the size of the chunk data and the actual data.
trans-unit.target: Hver gruppe består av to deler – størrelsen på dataene gruppen, og de faktiske dataene.

trans-unit.source: When set to true the response is sent using chunked transfer encoding.
trans-unit.target: Når satt til SANN svaret er sendt ved hjelp av delvis koding.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the response is set to use chunked transfer encoding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis svaret er satt til å bruke delvis overføring kode. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds or updates a <xref:System.Net.Cookie> in the collection of cookies sent with this response.
trans-unit.target: Legger til eller oppdaterer en <xref:System.Net.Cookie>i samlingen av informasjonskapsler sendt i svaret.</xref:System.Net.Cookie>

trans-unit.source: Two cookies are considered the same if the values of their <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Domain%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Path%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: To informasjonskapsler regnes samme hvis verdiene i sin <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Domain%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.Cookie.Path%2A>Egenskaper er like.</xref:System.Net.Cookie.Path%2A> </xref:System.Net.Cookie.Domain%2A> </xref:System.Net.Cookie.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: If these three pieces of information are the same, the method attempts to update the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse tre informasjonselementer er like, forsøker metoden å oppdatere informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: The name and domain comparisons are not case sensitive, but the path comparison is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligninger navnet og domenet er bokstaver, men banen sammenligningen er bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Cookie> for this response.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.Cookie>for dette svaret.</xref:System.Net.Cookie>

trans-unit.source: cookie is .
trans-unit.target: cookieis .

trans-unit.source: The cookie already exists in the collection and could not be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonskapselen allerede finnes i samlingen, og kan ikke erstattes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP status code to be returned to the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir HTTP-statuskode som skal returneres til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Clients use the status code returned by the server to decide how to proceed.
trans-unit.target: Klienter bruke statuskoden returnert av serveren til å bestemme hvordan du vil fortsette.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> indicates that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>indikerer at serveren ble behandlet klientens forespørsel, og den forespurte ressursen er inkludert i svar meldingsteksten.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: Other common status codes include <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, indicating that the requested resource was not found on the server, and <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, indicating that it was unnecessary to return the requested resource in the response body because the client's cached copy of the resource is up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: Andre vanlige statuskoder inkluderer <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, som angir at den forespurte ressursen ikke ble funnet på serveren, og <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, som angir at det er nødvendig å returnere den forespurte ressursen i meldingsteksten svar fordi klienten er bufret kopi av ressursen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of possible status codes, see the <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En fullstendig liste over mulige statuskoder, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>opplisting.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the HTTP status code for the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir HTTP-statuskode for den forespurte ressursen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, indicating that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>, indikerer at serveren ble behandlet klientens forespørsel, og den forespurte ressursen er inkludert i svar meldingsteksten.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: This object is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon er ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between 100 and 999 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier er mellom 100 og 999.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text description of the HTTP status code returned to the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en beskrivelse av HTTP-statuskoden returneres til klienten.

trans-unit.source: The status description typically provides details that explain the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelse av status gir vanligvis detaljer som forklarer den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text description of the HTTP status code returned to the client.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelse av HTTP-statuskoden returneres til klienten.

trans-unit.source: The default is the RFC 2616 description for the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode*> property value, or an empty string ("") if an RFC 2616 description does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er RFC 2616 beskrivelse for den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode*>egenskapsverdien eller en tom streng ("") Hvis en RFC 2616 beskrivelse ikke finnes.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.StatusCode*>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation contains non-printable characters.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon inneholder tegn som ikke kan skrives.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.HttpListenerResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A> method to send the response and release resources held by an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A>metoden send svaret for å frigi ressurser holdes av en <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse>.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse> </xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: To discard the response and release the resources held by this instance, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Abort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forkaste svaret og frigi ressurser beholdes i denne forekomsten, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Abort%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.HttpListenerResponse.Abort%2A>
